meanings.definition: The quality of being inexhaustible or unlimited in quantity or extent.
meanings.sent1: The inexhaustibleness of the water source ensured a constant supply for the village.
meanings.sent2: The inexhaustibleness of her energy amazed everyone around her.
meanings.sent3: The magician's hat seemed to possess an inexhaustibleness of colorful scarves.
meanings.sent4: Her inexhaustibleness of patience was like a bottomless well, never running dry.
meanings.sent5: The inexhaustibleness of the treasure chest was a legend among pirates.

meanings.definition: The state of being incapable of being used up or depleted.
meanings.sent1: The inexhaustibleness of the sunlight brightened up the room all day.
meanings.sent2: The farmer marveled at the inexhaustibleness of the fertile soil in his fields.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's toy box appeared to have an inexhaustibleness of surprises hidden inside.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed with an inexhaustibleness that lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The artist's creativity seemed to flow with an inexhaustibleness, producing masterpiece after masterpiece.
